code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const announcementsData=[{id:1,title:"New Course Added: Data Science",date:"Jan 30, 2025",category:"Courses",details:"We have added a new Data Science course to the platform!"},{id:2,title:"Scheduled Maintenance",date:"Feb 5, 2025",category:"System",details:"Our platform will be down for maintenance from 12 AM to 4 AM."},{id:3,title:"Scholarship Applications Open",date:"Feb 10, 2025",category:"Opportunities",details:"Apply for our 2025 academic scholarships before March 15."}];function AnnouncementsPage(){const[search,setSearch]=useState("");const[expanded,setExpanded]=useState(null);const filteredAnnouncements=announcementsData.filter(announcement=>announcement.title.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase())||announcement.category.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase()));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"announcements-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\uD83D\uDCE2 Announcements"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Stay updated with the latest news and updates."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search announcements...",value:search,onChange:e=>setSearch(e.target.value),className:"search-box"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"announcements-list",children:filteredAnnouncements.map(announcement=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"announcement-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{onClick:()=>setExpanded(expanded===announcement.id?null:announcement.id),children:[announcement.title," (",announcement.date,")",expanded===announcement.id?" ðŸ”¼":" ðŸ”½"]}),expanded===announcement.id&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:announcement.details})]},announcement.id))})]});}export default AnnouncementsPage;
